td.content: s:pt describes moderate pain and swelling in left shoulder, moderate swelling and mild numbness of the left arm and moderate denial of any past history of surgery and intravenous drug use. patient is a 63 yo F radiologist. o:Height 61 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Deep Venous Thrombosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed heparin - 5000 unit every 8 hours monitored IV infusion, and ordered Duplex US of leg, CBC, PT, PTT.
